messages.message:
hmm this breaks running these services locally in Docker and also apparently breaks CI

https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C039JKRCE2H/p1703013814047669

This is because the default `build-env-local` and `build-env-docker` targets expect `$(current_dir)/deployment/env/deployment-config.json` to exist.

```build-env-local:
	mkdir -p $(current_dir)/tmp
	python $(project_dir)/shared-utils/build-utils/stack-local/get-env-local.py \
	$(current_dir)/deployment/env/deployment-config.json \
	$(project_dir)/shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local.json \
	$(current_dir)/deployment/local/docker-env.json > $(current_dir)/tmp/env_local
	echo "export LEGACY='$(LEGACY)'" >> $(current_dir)/tmp/env_local

build-env-docker:
	mkdir -p $(current_dir)/tmp/hotconfig && touch $(current_dir)/tmp/hotconfig/base-hot-config.yml
	CONFIG_NAME=docker-local \
	python $(project_dir)/shared-utils/build-utils/stack-local/get-env-local.py \
	$(current_dir)/deployment/env/deployment-config.json \
	$(project_dir)/shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local.json \
	$(current_dir)/deployment/local/docker-env.json > $(current_dir)/tmp/docker_env_local.list```
